ARABIC: إِذْ تَسْتَغِيثُونَ رَبَّكُمْ فَٱسْتَجَابَ لَكُمْ أَنِّى مُمِدُّكُم بِأَلْفٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ مُرْدِفِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Remember when you called on your Lord for help and He responded to you: 'I will reinforce you with a thousand angels riding rank after rank.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Remember when you prayed to your Lord for help, He heard you and said: "I shall send a thousand angels following behind you for your aid."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And recall when you implored your Lord for help and He responded to you: 'I will indeed reinforce you with a thousand angels, coming host after host.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When you (believers) begged for assistance from your Lord, He said, "I am helping you with a thousand angels, all in rows marching one after the other".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When you (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) were seeking the help of your Lord, so He answered your prayers that, “I will help you with a row of thousands of angels.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Remember) when you sought help of your Lord and He answered you (saying): "I will help you with a thousand of the angels Murdifin."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When you sought aid from your Lord, so He answered you: I will assist you with a thousand of the angels following one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When you were calling upon your Lord for succour, and He answered you, 'I shall reinforce you with a thousand angels riding behind you.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When ye sought help of your Lord and He answered you (saying): I will help you with a thousand of the angels, rank on rank.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When you prayed to your Lord for help, He answered, "I am sending to your aid a thousand angels in succession."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And recall what time ye implored our Lord and He answered you: verily I am about to succour you with a thousand of angels rank in rank.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When you appealed to your Lord for help, He answered you: ‘I will aid you with a thousand angels in a file.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Remember ye implored the assistance of your Lord, and He answered you: "I will assist you with a thousand of the angels, ranks on ranks."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Remember) when you sought help of your Lord and He answered you (saying): "I will help you with a thousand of the angels each behind the other (following one another) in succession."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when you (Prophet Muhammad) prayed to your Lord for help, He answered: 'I am sending to your aid a thousand angels in succession'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When you appealed to your Lord for help, He answered you, “I am reinforcing you with one thousand angels in succession.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Remember] when you asked help of your Lord, and He answered you, "Indeed, I will reinforce you with a thousand from the angels, following one another."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:9] When you sought help from your Lord, asking Him to help you by granting you victory over them, and He answered you [saying]: ‘I shall reinforce you, I shall assist you, with a thousand angels, rank upon rank’,   one rank following after the next: God promised them this [number] at first, but it then became three thousand, and then five thousand, as stated in [sūrat] Āl ‘Imrān [Q. 3:124-125] (a variant reading [of alf, ‘thousand’] has the plural āluf, ‘thousands’, similar [in pattern] to aflus, ‘coins’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When ye sought help of) when you called upon (your Lord) to assist you on the Day of Badr (and He answered you (saying): I will help you with a thousand of the angels, rank on rank) coming one after another to help you.
